summary:
This mod makes it so College mages (Colette, Enthir, Tolfdir etc.) will sell you flawless gems.

Why?

Because you need them for enchanting with Ordinator. (Ordinator not required!)

Needs: USLEEP
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes it so College mages (Colette, Enthir, Tolfdir etc.) will sell you flawless gems.

Why? 
Because you need them for enchanting with Ordinator. (Ordinator not required!)


Needs:  USLEEP

Compatibility:
- will have issues with anything that changes the things that the Teachers at the college sell you. e.g. Immersive college of winterhold, spell research. It won't crash your game but only the mod that you load last will have its changes implemented

- will have problems with any mods that change the entries related to the flawless gems because I had to add a keyword so that mages would buy and sell them. (I know of no other mods that do this...)

- other than that it should be compatible with anything.
author: Chack321

files.name: College mages sell flawless Gems and Immersive College
